PHRASE.LANG: Four days in a row? That's true dedication.You've just won the maximum daily bonus of 200 XP!
Quatre jours d'affilée ? Voilà du vrai dévouement. Vous venez de remporter le bonus quotidien maximal de 200 XP.
Vier Tage hintereinander? Das ist echter Einsatz! Damit gewinnst du den höchsten Tagesbonus von 200 EP!
Quattro giorni consecutivi? Questa è vera dedizione. Hai appena vinto il bonus giornaliero massimo di 200 XP!
¿Cuatro días seguidos? Eso sí que es dedicación. Acabas de conseguir la bonificación diaria máxima: ¡200 XP!
4日連続!? 毎日ありがとうございます！ 連続訪問ボーナスの経験値としては最大の、200さしあげます！
연속 4일 째라고요? 그게 진정한 헌신의 자세입니다. 당신은 지금 최대 일일 보너스인 200 XP를 얻었습니다!
Four days in a row? That's true dedication.You've just won the maximum daily bonus of 200 XP!
連續四天？這是真正的全心投入。你剛剛贏得每日最高獎勵的200個經驗點數！
連續四天？這是真正的全心投入。你剛剛贏得每日最高獎勵的200個經驗點數！
Four days in a row? That's true dedication.You've just won the maximum daily bonus of 200 XP!
We've given you an extra 100 XP for visiting three days in a row. If you can make it tomorrow, we'll give you 200 XP!
Nous vous avons donné 100 XP supplémentaires pour être venu trois jours d'affilée. Si vous pouvez venir demain, nous vous donnerons 200 XP.
Wir haben dir 100 EP dafür gutgeschrieben, dass du uns an drei aufeinanderfolgenden Tagen besuchst. Wenn du es morgen auch schaffst, erhältst du 200 EP!
Ti abbiamo regalato 100 XP bonus per averci visitato per tre giorni consecutivi. Se ce la fai a venire anche domani, ti regaliamo 200 XP!
Te hemos dado 100 EXP adicionales por venir a vernos tres días seguidos. Si vienes mañana, ¡te daremos 200 EXP!
3日連続訪問ボーナスとして経験値を100さしあげます！ 明日も来ればボーナス経験値は200に！
3일 연속 방문을 해준 댓가로 추가적으로 100 XP를 지급해드렸습니다. 내일도 방문한다면 200 XP를 드릴 것입니다!
We've given you an extra 100 XP for visiting three days in a row. If you can make it tomorrow, we'll give you 200 XP!
對於你連續三天到訪本遊戲，我們已額外獎勵你100個經驗點數。若你明天還來，我們將給你200個經驗點數！
對於你連續三天到訪本遊戲，我們已額外獎勵你100個經驗點數。若你明天還來，我們將給你200個經驗點數！
We've given you an extra 100 XP for visiting three days in a row. If you can make it tomorrow, we'll give you 200 XP!
We'd like to give you a bonus of 50 XP for coming here two days in a row. Come back tomorrow to claim 100 XP!
Nous aimerions vous donner un bonus de 50 XP pour être venu ici deux jours d'affilée. Revenez demain pour demander 100 XP.
Wir möchten dir einen Bonus von 50 EP geben, weil du zwei Tage hintereinander hier bist. Komme morgen wieder, dann erhältst du 100 EP!
Ti regaliamo un bonus di 50 XP per essere venuto per due giorni consecutivi. Torna domani per richiedere 100 XP!
Queremos darte una bonificación de 50 EXP por haber venido dos días seguidos. ¡Vuelve mañana para conseguir 100 EXP!
2日連続訪問ボーナスとして経験値を50さしあげます。明日も来ればボーナス経験値は100に！
2일 연속 여기를 방문해준 댓가로 보너스 50 XP를 드리겠습니다. 내일 또 오면 100 XP를 받을 수 있습니다!
We'd like to give you a bonus of 50 XP for coming here two days in a row. Come back tomorrow to claim 100 XP!
對於你連續兩天來訪，我們獎勵你50個經驗點數。明天再來，即可領取100個經驗點數！
對於你連續兩天來訪，我們獎勵你50個經驗點數。明天再來，即可領取100個經驗點數！
We'd like to give you a bonus of 50 XP for coming here two days in a row. Come back tomorrow to claim 100 XP!
If you come back tomorrow, we'll give you 50 XP for visiting two days in a row!
Si vous revenez demain, nous vous donnerons 50 XP pour être venu deux jours d'affilée !
Wenn du morgen wiederkommst, erhältst du von uns 50 EP dafür, dass du uns an zwei aufeinanderfolgenden Tagen besuchst!
Se ritorni domani, ti regaleremo 50 XP per averci visitati per due giorni consecutivi!
Si vuelves mañana, ¡te daremos 50 EXP adicionales por venir a vernos dos días seguidos!
ぜひ明日も来てくださいね。2日連続訪問ボーナスとして、経験値を50さしあげますので！
내일 또 오면, 2일 연속 방문 댓가로 50 XP를 드리겠습니다!
If you come back tomorrow, we'll give you 50 XP for visiting two days in a row!
若你明天再來，我們將因你連續兩天到訪而給你50個經驗點數！
若你明天再來，我們將因你連續兩天到訪而給你50個經驗點數！
If you come back tomorrow, we'll give you 50 XP for visiting two days in a row!
また会いましたね、$nameさん。
Hello $name. It's great to see you back here again!
Bonjour $name. C'est bon de vous revoir ici !
Hallo, $name]. Schön, dass du wieder da bist!
Hola, $name. ¡Qué alegría volverte a ver por aquí!
どうも、$nameさん。またお会いできて嬉しいです！
안녕하세요 $name. 여기서 다시 보게 되서 반갑네요!
Hello $name. It's great to see you back here again!
你好 $name。再次見到你來訪，太好了！
你好 $name。再次見到你來訪，太好了！
Hello $name. It's great to see you back here again!
あぁ、$nameさん、おかえりなさい！
Greetings $name. It's good to see you here again.
Salutations $name. Il est bon de vous revoir ici.
Sei gegrüßt, $name. Schön, dich hier wiederzusehen!
Buenas, $name. Qué bien que volvemos a verte por aquí.
どうも、$nameさん。また会えて嬉しいです。
환영합니다 $name. 여기서 다시 보게 되어 반갑습니다.
Greetings $name. It's good to see you here again.
Greetings $name. It's good to see you here again.
Salut $name. Soyez à nouveau le bienvenu à Aurora !
$nameさん、オーロラにおかえりなさい！
안녕하세요 $name. Aurora에 다시 온 것을 환영합니다!
嗨，$name。歡迎再次到訪極光群島！
嗨，$name。歡迎再次到訪極光群島！
Welcome friend, to the fabled lands of Aurora. Stay awhile and rest from your arduous journey. Once you're ready, please explore Aurora and enjoy the wondrous vistas on offer.
Bienvenu, l'ami, sur les mythiques terres d'Aurora. Restez un moment et récupérez de votre périple. Une fois que vous serez prêt, explorez donc Aurora et profitez de nos merveilleuses vues.

Willkommen in den sagenumwobenen Landen von Aurora, Freund. Bleib eine Weile und erhole dich von deiner anstrengenden Reise. Wenn du bereit bist, kannst du Aurora entdecken und die beeindruckende Aussicht genießen.
Benvenuto nelle leggendarie terre di Aurora. Resta un po' di tempo e riposati dal duro viaggio. Quando sarai pronto, esplora Aurora e goditi i meravigliosi panorami che offre.
Te doy la bienvenida a las legendarias tierras de Aurora. Quédate un tiempo y descansa de tu largo viaje. Cuando estés a punto, explora Aurora y disfruta de sus maravillosas vistas.
伝説の地、オーロラへようこそいらっしゃいました。 疲れたでしょう、ゆっくりお休みください。 準備が整ったら、ぜひオーロラを探索し、美しい景色をお楽しみください。
Aurora의 우화 속 땅에 온 것을 환영하네, 친구. 잠시 머물면서 당신의 고된 여행으로부터 휴식을 취하게나. 자네가 준비되면, Aurora를 탐험하고 이 섬이 제공하는 멋진 경치를 즐기게나.
Welcome friend, to the fabled lands of Aurora. Stay awhile and rest from your arduous journey. Once you're ready, please explore Aurora and enjoy the wondrous vistas on offer.
我的朋友，歡迎來到傳說中的極光群島。在經過艱苦的旅行之後，請在此處逗留片刻休息一下。一旦你準備就緒，請探索極光群島並享受本島提供的壯麗景色。
我的朋友，歡迎來到傳說中的極光群島。在經過艱苦的旅行之後，請在此處逗留片刻休息一下。一旦你準備就緒，請探索極光群島並享受本島提供的壯麗景色。
Welcome friend, to the fabled lands of Aurora. Stay awhile and rest from your arduous journey. Once you're ready, please explore Aurora and enjoy the wondrous vistas on offer.
$userさんが$userlevelレベルになりました！
今後も新たな報酬が続々！
報酬ゲットまで経験値あと: %i
Attention all Aurora visitors! We have gained information that Aurora could come under attack in the near future! We're not sure where or when so keep your eyes on the skies!
À l'attention de tous les visiteurs d'Aurora ! D'après nos renseignements, une attaque va bientôt frapper Aurora ! Nous ne savons ni où, ni quand, donc surveillez le ciel !

Achtung, an alle Besucher von Aurora! Wir haben geheime Informationen erhalten, dass Aurora demnächst angegriffen werden könnte! Wir wissen nicht genau, wo oder wann, also behaltet den Himmel im Auge!

Attenzione, a tutti i visitatori di Aurora! Abbiamo ricevuto informazioni secondo cui Aurora potrebbe essere attaccata a breve! Non sappiamo dove o quando, per cui si prega ti tenere gli occhi puntati verso il cielo!
¡A todos los visitantes de Aurora! ¡Nos han informado de que podrían atacar Aurora muy pronto! No estamos seguros ni de dónde atacarán ni cuándo. ¡No pierdas de vista el cielo!
Attention all Aurora visitors! We have gained information that Aurora could come under attack in the near future! We're not sure where or when so keep your eyes on the skies!
Attention all Aurora visitors! We have gained information that Aurora could come under attack in the near future! We're not sure where or when so keep your eyes on the skies!
Attention all Aurora visitors! We have gained information that Aurora could come under attack in the near future! We're not sure where or when so keep your eyes on the skies!

Attention all Aurora visitors! We have gained information that Aurora could come under attack in the near future! We're not sure where or when so keep your eyes on the skies!
WARNING! Enemy craft have been spotted overhead! We need your help! Collect XP to stop the attack!
ATTENTION ! Des appareils ennemis ont été repérés dans le ciel ! Nous avons besoin de vous ! Ramassez des points de XP pour bloquer l'attaque !
WARNUNG! Feindliches Flugzeug am Himmel geortet! Wir brauchen deine Hilfe! Sammele EP, um den Angriff aufzuhalten!!
ATTENZIONE! È stato avvistato un velivolo sopra di noi! Ci serve aiuto! Per fermare l'attacco bisogna raccogliere XP!
¡ATENCIÓN! ¡Nave enemiga avistada en el cielo! ¡Necesitamos tu ayuda! ¡Consigue EXP para detener el ataque!
WARNING! Enemy craft have been spotted overhead! We need your help! Collect XP to stop the attack!
WARNING! Enemy craft have been spotted overhead! We need your help! Collect XP to stop the attack!

WARNING! Enemy craft have been spotted overhead! We need your help! Collect XP to stop the attack!
WARNING! The enemy continue to build up their fleet! Keep collecting XP to stop the attack!
ATTENTION ! L'ennemi continue de développer sa flotte ! Continuez de ramasser des points de XP pour bloquer l'attaque !
WARNUNG! Der Feind baut seine Flotte aus! Sammele weiter EP, um den Angriff aufzuhalten!
ATTENZIONE! Il nemico sta rinforzando la sua flotta! Continua a raccogliere XP per fermare l'attacco!
¡ATENCIÓN! ¡El enemigo sigue aumentando su flota! ¡Consigue más EXP para detener el ataque!
WARNING! The enemy continue to build up their fleet! Keep collecting XP to stop the attack!
WARNING! The enemy continue to build up their fleet! Keep collecting XP to stop the attack!

WARNING! The enemy continue to build up their fleet! Keep collecting XP to stop the attack!
WARNING! The enemy are almost upon us! Keep collecting XP to save Aurora!
ATTENTION ! L'ennemi est très proche ! Continuez de ramasser des points de XP pour sauver Aurora !
WARNUNG! Der Feind ist fast da! Sammele weiter EP, um Aurora zu retten!
ATTENZIONE! Il nemico è ormai su di noi! Continua a raccogliere XP per salvare Aurora!
¡ATENCIÓN! ¡El enemigo nos alcanza! ¡Consigue más EXP para salvar Aurora!
WARNING! The enemy are almost upon us! Keep collecting XP to save Aurora!

Congratulations! You helped stop the attack and saved the island! On behalf of nDreams thank you for being part of Aurora and PlayStation®Home history!
Félicitations ! Vous avez contribué à repousser l'attaque et à sauver l'île ! Merci d'avoir forgé l'histoire d'Aurora et de PlayStation®Home, de la part de nDreams !
Glückwunsch! Du hast mitgeholfen, den Angriff abzuwehren und die Insel zu retten! Im Namen von nDreams danken wir dir, Teil der Aurora- und Playstation®Home-Geschichte zu sein!
Congratulazioni! Con il tuo aiuto abbiamo fermato l'attacco e salvato l'isola! Da parte di nDreams, grazie! Ora fai parte della storia di Aurora e di PlayStation®Home!
¡Enhorabuena! ¡Has ayudado a detener el ataque y has salvado la isla! De parte de nDreams, ¡gracias por formar parte de Aurora y de la historia de PlayStation®Home!
Congratulations! You helped stop the attack and saved the island! On behalf of nDreams thank you for being part of Aurora and PlayStation®Home history!
